text: Golden Earrings is a 1947 American romantic spy drama movie directed by Mitchell Leisen and is based on the novel of the same name by Jolán Földes. It stars Ray Milland, Marlene Dietrich, Murvyn Vye, Bruce Lester, Dennis Hoey, Quentin Reynolds and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1940s spy movies Category:1947 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American spy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Mitchell Leisen
title: Golden Earrings
